short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically gives user a preview of the assignment they're submitting on Canvas

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Verify your work right before submitting it on Canvas using this light Chrome Extension! It will show a preview of your assignment so that it can be verified before submission! Additionally, you can verify that you're submitting the right file for the right assignment!

Authors: Ansh Sikka
Improvements: Rahim Nathwani

This will work on all Instructure Canvas websites.
